description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Adolescent Health And Nutrition, Infant And Young Child Feeding, Maternal And Newborn Health, Prevention Of Stunting And Other Forms Of Malnutrition. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2019 children 0-5 years old, especially the 1.6 million living in extreme poverty, have their rights to survival, development, protection and participation guaranteed through comprehensive early child development policies, and children 6-11 years old have equitable access to quality primary school, with special attention to indigenous girls and boys.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: Prevention of all forms of malnutrition, with a focus on child overweight and obesity was the focus for UNICEF in 2019. UNICEF worked on evidence-generation, advocacy and policy dialogue in diverse issues ranging from front of pack nutrition labelling to schools as enabling environments for prevention of overweight and obesity. | Status:Met | As-of Date:23/01/2020

actual.value: 2018:The final report (Evaluación de impacto del proyecto piloto: “Cuidando al recién nacido y a la madre en casa en comunidades de la sierra de Zongolica, Veracruz) was finalized. Meetings with the new health authorities were requested to present the results and evaluate the possibility of scaling up th

title.narrative: Estrategia implementada para prevenir la malnutricin (desnutricin/obesidad) en poblacin vulnerable, menor de 5 aos.

target.value: 2019:Existe una estrategia implementada para prevenir la malnutrición (desnutrición/obesidad) en población vulnerable, menor de 5 años.

actual.value: 2020:El gobierno actual no cuenta con una estrategia concreta para la prevencion de la malnutricion para la poblacion menor de 5 años. Sin embargo se está avanzando con medidas amplias para la prevención del sobrepeso y obesidad como la adopción de un etiquetado frontal de alimentos.

title.narrative: Adoption of the International Code on Marketing of Breastmilk substitutes as legislation and subsequent relevant World Health Assembly resolutions

target.value: 2018:There is a national legislation that includes the adoption of the International Code
